snippet.title: Classic Racers Elite Teaser
snippet.description:
A pure time-attack racing game, that takes place in the 60’s era.
It’s a hill climb racing game where the goal is simple, you are at the bottom of the hill and like in rally, you must climb to the top as fast as possible.
The Elite version includes time attack on the tracks encompassing the full scope of vintage driving.

Retrieve the feeling of racing to score the best time on the leaderboards
of the many tracks available.

Feel the sensations of having a monstruous car that wants your wife to be a widow.

Enjoy the era of the iconic cars and drive them brutally to get the best of them.

Be the first on the worldwide leaderboards.

FEATURES
Simcade physic engine for a real car feeling, but with a simple approach and control

4 car categories, from micro cars to F1

12 championships at launch and many more to come.

17 unique locations for a total of 50 tracks (variations from the 17 tracks include reversed segmented and slaloms). Many more to come.

Drive fantastic cars from the 60’s.

Online worldwide leaderboards for each track. Free Run mode for improving your times on the leaderboards.

Car screams and exhaust spits flames! A maximum of earing sensations.

Balanced game play with simple cars to control in the early championships and big power monsters towards the end.
